snippet: Queen Latifah will perform George Gershwin’s “The Man I Love” and Mr. Stoltzman is set to perform the “Interlude” from André Previn’s “Sonata for Clarinet and Piano” and Leonard Bernstein’s “Sonata for Clarinet and Piano.”
abstract: Queen Latifah will perform George Gershwin’s “The Man I Love” and Mr. Stoltzman is set to perform the “Interlude” from André Previn’s “Sonata for Clarinet and Piano” and Leonard Bernstein’s “Sonata for Clarinet and Piano.”

headline.main: Queen Latifah and Richard Stoltzman to Perform at New York City Ballet Gala
headline.print_headline: Queen Latifah to Perform At City Ballet Gala
